doc.title: Hanukah vs. Christmas
doc.plot: When Morris and Stuart, the heads of two immensely proud families with two religions find their children have just married on a trip to Vegas. They also find their 2 religious holy days fall on the same day. This is too much for warring fathers. With an invited list of Rabbi's, Priests and eccentric friends in attendance the escalating war begins as the two fathers are forced to share a dinner table.
